confirm_canvas_msg.message: Will you allow ${domain} to use your HTML5 canvas image data? This may be used to uniquely identify your computer.

confirm_audio_msg.message: Will you allow ${domain} to use your HTML5 audio sound data? This may be used to uniquely identify your computer.

popup.allow_expl.message: Fingerprinting blocker will only notify you about possible fingerprinting attempts.

popup.allow_confirm.message: Fingerprint will be "allowed" for the current domain.

popup.fake_confirm.message: Fingerprint will be "faked" for the current domain.

popup.block_confirm.message: Fingerprint will be "blocked" for the current domain.

popup.fake_expl.message: Fingerprinting blocker will automatically mix noise to the fingerprinting data. More settings for noise generation is available in the settings page.

popup.block_expl.message: Fingerprinting blocker will provide empty data, as if browser api is not supported. Warning: this option is more likelihood of breaking page.

popup.notify_expl.message: If you chose not to show notifications, you can change this settings via the settings page.

popup.detected_expl.message: Detected a possible fingerprinting attempt. This may be used to uniquely identify your computer.
